alternative_parents.description: Hydroxy acids with an alkyl chain the contains less than 6 carbon atoms.
alternative_parents.name: Short-chain hydroxy acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Aliphatic monocarboxylic acids with a saturated or unsaturated aliphatic tail (with at least 4 Carbon atoms).
alternative_parents.name: Fatty acids and conjugates

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing exactly two carboxylic acid groups.
alternative_parents.name: Dicarboxylic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituted with a hydroxyl group on the adjacent carbon.
alternative_parents.name: Alpha hydroxy acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a secondary alcohol functional group, with the general structure HOC(R)(R') (R,R'=alkyl, aryl).
alternative_parents.name: Secondary alcohols

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a transition metal atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic transition metal salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid group with the formula -C(=O)OH.
alternative_parents.name: Carboxylic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a carbonyl group, with the general structure RC(=O)R', where R=organyl, R'=H, N, O, organyl group or halide group.
alternative_parents.name: Carbonyl compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds with a positive electric charge.
alternative_parents.name: Organic cations

class.description: Compounds comprising one or more hydroxy acid groups.
class.name: Hydroxy acids and derivatives

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as beta hydroxy acids and derivatives. These are compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituted with a hydroxyl group on the C3 carbon atom.

direct_parent.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituted with a hydroxyl group on the C3 carbon atom.
direct_parent.name: Beta hydroxy acids and derivatives

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Compounds containing a carboxylic acid substituted with a hydroxyl group on the C3 carbon atom.
subclass.name: Beta hydroxy acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Compounds an organic acid or a derivative thereof.
superclass.name: Organic acids and derivatives
